title: **Welcome to Gay+ Men Meditating!**  <:yoga:880724849889259570>
description: We are a safe and friendly group of gay+ guys interested in practicing meditation or yoga. To join, you have to properly answer these questions:

fields.value:
**1**. Tell us something about yourself (age, sexuality, interests etc.)
**2**. Describe your experience with meditation or yoga or why you are interested in it.
**3**. Tell us why you want to join this group.

Include @moderator in your message so we will be notified of your answers.*
fields.name: ​

footer.text:
​
*You can directly message a moderator if you prefer. We will review your answers as soon as possible. #landing-zone is auto-moderated, so please keep your answers brief, proper-cased and free of links or any terms of abuse.
